paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the TTR gene variant Lys55Asn, including penetrance data and individual records.

patients.phenotype: binocular vitreous amyloidosis secondary to hereditary transthyretin amyloidosis (hATTR)

individual_records.phenotype_details: progressive visual decline in both eyes, diagnosed with binocular vitreous amyloidosis
individual_records.evidence_sentence: The patient was a 49-year-old man who complained of progressive visual decline in both eyes over a 2-mo period.

functional_data.summary: The variant results in the replacement of a lysine with an asparagine at position 55 of the mature protein.

variants.segregation_data: The elder brother of the patient refused to undergo pedigree testing because he had no symptoms in either eye.
variants.additional_notes: The patient had no obvious family history of disease.
key_quotes: the patient was heterozygous for a single nucleotide substitution, c.165 G>C, in exon 2 of the TTR gene, resulting in the replacement of a lysine with an asparagine at position 55 of the mature protein, p.Lys55Asn.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data was extracted from the main text.
